snippet: Ralph Krueger was fired as the coach of the Edmonton Oilers after leading the team to a 12th-place finish in the Western Conference in his lone season.
abstract: Ralph Krueger is fired as coach of NHL's Edmonton Oilers after 12th-place finish in Western Conference in his lone season.
lead_paragraph: Ralph Krueger was fired as the coach of the Edmonton Oilers after leading the team to a 12th-place finish in the Western Conference in his lone season.

headline.seo: Oilers Fire Ralph Krueger as Coach
